ComicInfo.Summary:
The sequel to the smash independent hit Return to Wonderland continues! Johnny Liddle, the new and sadistic Mad Hatter has been stalking Calie Liddle since his return from the twisted dimension known as Wonderland. But how did the boy become the Mad Hatter and what happened to him while trapped in that other world? The answers are revealed here!
